snippet.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild  |  Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the thrill of the hunt in a visually breathtaking, technically groundbreaking, vast open world. Developed by Expansive Worlds, published by Avalanche Studios. All footage captured in-engine.

theHunter: Call of the Wild will be released for PC, early 2017. Get a sneak peek in the closed, limited Beta running December 8 through 11, 2016. 

Learn more at http://callofthewild.thehunter.com. 

Follow us on Steam at http://steamcommunity.com/app/518790
